 Gale harold is a stage actor, but is probably best known for being Brian Kinney on XXXXX as Folk. Edward Norton was in American History X as well as Fight Club. Cillian Murphy was in 28 Days Later (Great movie) and Gael Garcia Bernal is a Spanish actor in Bad Education. Micheal Madsen was also in Kill Bill.
 
 Sharon Gless was in XXXXX as Folk. Zhang Zi Yi is in most big Chinese movies that make it to the states, Franka Potente is a German actress in Run Lola Run and The Bourne Identity. Naomie Harris was also in 28 Days Later.
thanks for that thorough background info bout all the actors/actresses... :p

Personally the Rocky Movies up through 4 the Matrix Movies and the Austin Powers Movies are some of my favorite movies of all time.
 
 I just tried covering all movie genres except drama (chick flicks) and horror. 
 This is my list like it or not.

 
 I love Austin Powers as well (could have done without Beyonce in Goldmember though :) )Ok, the Rocky movies are all right, but that doesn't make Stallone a great actor. The first Matrix movie was good, but they went down hill from there, and again, being in a good movie doesn't make you a good actor anymore than being in a bad movie makes you a bad one. Keanu Reeves has the range of a pineapple. He's either playing a dumb-but-loveable idiot (Bill and Ted) or he's taking himself too seriously (everthing else). I like Bill & Ted and The Matrix as much as the next person (in fact, more so with the Bill & Teds), but I know a mediocre actor when I see one.
 
 You covered all movie genres? With the exception of Mike Myers, you pretty much only covered action flicks. I don't know why you are equating drama with chick flicks. First of all, most dramas aren't chick flicks. Secondly, not all chick flicks are dramas.

Everyone's different. We don't all have to have the same favourite actors/actresses. Master_Shake can like who ever he/she wants. just because you don't the people he/she have mentioned doesn't mean that they suck. Be Open minded emoticon_xangel

 
 I know everyone is different. I know we can like different people. I know I can like whoever I want. First of all, to make things clear, I didn't say anyone sucked. I'm not going to be that rude and uncreative :) . Secondly, if you want to get technical, you're right. Some actors and actresses don't suck because someone dislikes them. If they suck, they suck because the suck, regardless of what anybody thinks emoticon_xangel . But again, I didn't say anyone sucks.
 
 Also, I'm free to comment on anyone's list here just as much as anyone here is free to comment on mine.

Yea my bad not all dramas are chick flicks (ex. The Jacket). Still i believe Keanu Reeves is an excellent actor along with all my other picks. I don't really give a damn what you think about their acting. My list and your list are different and I haven't stooped to criticizing yours cause that would be a waste of my time.
 
 :) have a nice day

Keanu Reeves has the range of a pineapple.
